title: Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - Ethanol Fire Pit, Fire Bowl, Mini Personal Fireplace for Indoor & Garden - Bio Ethanol Fuel
descriptions:
Turn any moment into a glowing centerpiece with the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit. Crafted from sleek graphite concrete with a marble-effect base, this mini ethanol fire bowl delivers the beauty of real flames in a modern, compact design—perfect for cozy nights indoors or magical gatherings in the garden.

- Clean-burning bio ethanol fuel: Enjoy a real flame without smoke, ash, or mess. Optimized for Roundfire premium bioethanol fuels with built-in flashback arrestors for added peace of mind.
- Long, lively burn: Over 1 hour of mesmerizing fire from a single fill, enhanced by a ceramic wool insert that boosts efficiency and extends burn time.
- Safe by design: Stainless steel burn cup helps prevent leakage, the chamber cools rapidly after use, and a flat stainless steel extinguisher tool is included for quick, easy flame control.
- Heat-smart base: The marble-effect base dissipates heat to help protect tabletops and surfaces while you relax.
- Portable ambiance anywhere: Lightweight and easy to move—set the mood on your dining table, balcony, patio, or coffee table.
- Fun and functional: Create a warm, cozy atmosphere and make simple treats like s’mores and marshmallows right at the table.

Elevate your décor, spark conversation, and savor the glow of real fire—smoke-free, stress-free, and effortlessly stylish—with the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit.
